data.name: PIZZA POSSUM
data.detailed_description:
A game about a very hungry possum causing mayhem in a picturesque beach town. You run around a lovingly handcrafted island while trying to stuff as much delicious food into your mouth as possible, hiding from the local guards. Unlock more parts of the island by staying on the loose!

Pizza Possum is a top down stealth-evasion-game. Your goal is to steal food while avoiding the guards through hiding and clever navigation.

  • Arcade-Highscore gameplay with some roguelite elements
  • Beautifully handcrafted 3D game world
  • Fast paced blend of strategic stealth and chaotic action
  • Intuitive, easy to learn controls
  • Fluid movement and animations thanks to physics based animation system
  • Possums!
  • Pizzas!
